div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1561 Latakia (anc. Laodiceia ad Mare) environs, Seleucis, 1950 Burial: c. 140 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 9 AR Alexander III: 6 late post. tetradr. (Tem- nus 2, Alabanda 3, Miletus 1) Lysimachus: 1 lifetime tetradr. (Heracleia Pontica) 1 post. tetradr. (Lampsacus) Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
